title: AI summaries of blog posts on the news items
body: When news items are links to blog posts we would like to use an AI API to look at and summarize the source and add the summary to the post.

nodes.body:
For this I'll need an account with a service provider to be set up. Looking around, openai has the best pricing at the moment with $0.05-$0.40 per million tokens for the gpt-5-nano model for what should be relatively simple tasks (or $0.025-$0.20 if the specific task isn't very urgent, as in the case of this ticket).

Pricing is available here: https://platform.openai.com/docs/pricing?latest-pricing=standard

Thanks
Hold off on creating that account for a bit, I might take a different approach. I want to do some more research first.

I've decided to use openrouter instead, because it gives similar pricing and access to many more models from a lot of vendors. Can someone create an account there, and allow us to create keys? Thanks in advance.
This is now merged to develop.
